name: The Shifting Mirror
description: A quiet plane of rippling light, where past lives echo and future potential awaits. Time is suspended here — only decisions remain.

story_actions.story_text: You awaken in the mirror-world. Your reflection watches silently.
Engrave your memory into the fabric of the world. (Increase Max Story Points)
Strengthen your foundation. (Increase Base Strength by 1)
Attune to the flow of thought. (Regenerate Focus over time)
You step forward. The mirror ripples, then steadies — your new self reflected clearly. The cycle is complete. You are ready to begin again.
